xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.3 Hetuduka, Vipākattika » 1.3.2 Vipākadhammapada » 1.3.2.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Vipākattika
Vipākadhammapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
128.
226Hetu vipākadhammadhammo hetussa vipākadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
129.
227Hetu vipākadhammadhammo hetussa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  nava.
130.
228Hetu vipākadhammadhammo hetussa vipākadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—  ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati…  nava.
131.
229Hetu vipākadhammadhammo hetussa vipākadhammadhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo…pe…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo—  ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo…  nava…  āsevanapaccayena paccayo…  nava.
132.
230Nahetu vipākadhammadhammo nahetussa vipākadhammadhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
231Nahetu vipākadhammadhammo nahetussa vipākadhammadhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
133.
232Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ, anulomaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
